item.title: Keep Calm And ...
item.description: I needed some new wall “art” for my home office, and decided that a couple of small “Keep Calm” posters would do the trick. Naturally I got a bit carried away, and created more than one, and of course, most of them are virtualization related: [gallery ids=“2412,2413,2414,2415,2416,2417,2418,2422,2424,2425,2427,2429,2431,2441,2444,2446,2452,2455,2459,2460,2461,2463,2469,2471,2476,2480,2483,2485,2487,2499,2511,2512,2547,2572,2575” orderby=“rand”] If you have some ideas, IÂ´ll gladly create more, just leave a comment! I would also love photos if you printed out any of these and put them on a wall or in a frame somewhere.
